scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/scss -o src/css --watch
scripts.build: react-scripts build && mv build/static/js/main*.js build/static/js/main.min.js && mv build/static/css/main*.css build/static/css/main.min.css && rm -rf ../static && mv build/static ../ && cp src/scss/* node_modules/react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css ../assets/theming
